title: "FDAI Visualization"
author: "Dan Spakowicz"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("../data/fdai_score-calculations.csv")

head(x)
```

```{r}
complete <- 
  x %>%
  filter(ga.complete)

complete %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = FDAI)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
complete %>%
  summarize(median = median(FDAI))
```
```{r}
complete %>%
  mutate("FDAI\nCategory" = if_else(FDAI <= median(FDAI),
                            true = "Low",
                            false = "High")) %>%
  complete %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = FDAI)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(fill = `FDAI\nCategory`)) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 9) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")

ggsave("../figures/fdai_histogram_category.png",
       height = 2, width = 3)
```
